channel.title: Explainable AI on Devashree Madhugiri
channel.description: Recent content in Explainable AI on Devashree Madhugiri

item.title: Understanding Machine Learning Models Better with Explainable AI ðŸ’»
item.description: The inner workings of a Machine Learning model are challenging to understand. Explainable AI aims to create a transparency by explaining how the machine learning model arrived at the decision. There are few interesting Explainable AI libraries for Python that present these details within an interactive dashboard. In this blog article, I have explored the ExplainableDashboard library with a simple regression model. This article has been published on the ‘Towards Data Science’ blog.
